174.57: ‘Ye rash people,’ he exclaimed, ‘who gave precedence to your mouth over your ears: yet still persist in your rashness. ...
174.56: There was a certain heretic who saw Raba engrossed in his studies while the finger[s] of his hand were under his feet, and he ground them down, so that his fingers spurted blood. ...
174.58: First ye should have listened, if within your powers, accept; if not, ye should not have accepted.’ ...
